To install pyo, you will need the following dependencies:
  * [http://www.python.org/download Python 2.6.x Python 2.6.x]
  * [http://www.portaudio.com portaudio]
  * [http://www.mega-nerd.com/libsndfile libsndfile]

The easiest way to get portaudio and libsndfile is to install [http://csound.sourceforge.net/ csound], it will install those libraries for you.
